name: Blin OS: Interactive Desktop
description: An interactive operating system concept based on glassmorphism, featuring a welcome animation with BLIN logo colors, a simulated file management system with detailed file type icons and content previews, runnable interactive applications (Spotify fake app with playback controls, interactive Browser with navigation, and a BLIN Navigator for file management), improved draggable desktop widgets (including weather, calendar, tasks, system monitor, and notes), a dynamic desktop with customizable backgrounds, and a login experience.
